tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wildlife_habitats (
    habitat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    habitat_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    habitat_type VARCHAR(50),
    habitat_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE Species (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name TEXT,
    conservation_status TEXT,
    population_size INT,
    habitat_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Observations (
    observation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    observation_date DATE,
    observation_location TEXT,
    observer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE observation (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  observation_date DATE NOT NULL,
  observation_time TIME NOT NULL,
  observer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  observation_description TEXT,
  animal_id INT REFERENCES animal(id)
);

CREATE TABLE tourist (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  nationality VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE visit (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  visit_date DATE NOT NULL,
  visit_time TIME NOT NULL,
  tourist_id INT REFERENCES tourist(id),
  habitat_id INT REFERENCES habitat(id)
);
